generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Atlanta college student Alexis Crawford was choked to death, dumped in park, police say," you might expect a detailed account of the events surrounding the tragic incident involving Alexis Crawford. The piece is likely to provide information on the circumstances of her death, including any relevant police findings and investigations. Additionally, the article may explore the broader implications of such incidents on campus safety and community responses. It could also include statements from law enforcement and possibly insights from her peers or family, although this remains uncertain.
